Necromancer Robe

The Necromancer Robe is specialized equipment for the Necromancer class.

Description

This robe is imbued with dark magic and will allow the Necromancer to accumulate skill points from defeated monsters. When any creature dies while the Necromancer is wearing this robe, the wearer gains 1 skill point.

Properties

  • Class Restriction: Only Necromancers can use this robe
  • Armor Class: Functions as a regular armor piece (tier 1)
  • Soul Accumulation: Provides 1 skill point when any creature dies while wearing the robe

Abilities

  • Soul Accumulation: Gain 1 skill point when any creature dies while wearing the robe

Acquisition

  • Found as treasure in dungeon levels
  • Potentially available in special shops

Comparison with Other Equipment

  • Necromancer Armor - Special armor for Necromancer subclass that has different abilities (Necrotism special ability)
  • Different equipment for different playstyles (passive soul accumulation vs. active necromantic abilities)

Related Items

  • Necromancer Armor - Alternative equipment for Necromancer subclass
  • Necromancer Class - The hero class that can use this equipment

Strategy

  • Provides passive skill point accumulation for Necromancer heroes
  • Good for long-term progression and character development
  • Allows for skill point farming by luring enemies to their death
  • Works well in combination with other necromantic abilities for sustained combat
